sentences: Ameeriklased on tuntud oma vabaühenduste kultuuri poolest.
Paljud ameeriklased rändavad teistesse riikidesse tööle ja elama.
context: Ameeriklased is the plural form of 'ameeriklane' and refers to people from the United States. The word can specifically refer to the main population group that makes up USA residents, or more broadly to all inhabitants of America (including both North and South America). In common usage, it typically means Americans - citizens or residents of the United States.
